author: noel
msg: revert change because of a typo in the CVS log that would prevent JIRA from finding the fix

author: noel
msg: Fix JAMES-444.  Was catching the wrong exception for an ArrayList.  Also tweaked some non-critical response text for clarity/consistency.

author: noel
msg: Fix for JAMES-96.  If there is a nested exception, it will be logged, too.  Not ideal, but gets the job done.  Better solutions would be good.  Possibility a utility for iterating the nested exception chain.

author: noel
msg: InetAddress caches without regarding to DNS TTL.  Switch to using dnsjava Address.get[All]ByName.  Eventually we should look at using JNDI for DNS services, at least in the Mailet API.

author: noel
msg: corrected missing that was breaking the docs build
